Package simulation.ui

Class MainApp

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
simulation.ui.MainApp
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISimulatorUI
public class MainApp extends javafx.application.Application implements ISimulatorUI
Main JavaFX application for the Coffee Shop Simulation.

Implements the ISimulatorUI interface and provides a user interface for configuring, running, and visualising a coffee shop simulation where customers move through cashier, barista, finishing, and pickup stages.

Supports controls for simulation speed, pausing, resuming, and stepping through individual events. Displays simulation results, history, and summary statistics.
